loader.description: Script bootstrap, environment detection, one-time initialization, global namespace wiring.

dom.description: Low-level DOM helpers: create elements, show/hide, focus management, scrolling, wrapping, loading states.

events.description: Event binding/unbinding, dispatch, subscription, transaction wrappers.

selection.description: Choice/selection list management, add/remove items, filtering, sorting, option conversion.

fuzzySearch.description: Fuzzy search / indexing / scoring functions derived from embedded library (e.g., fuse.js/minified search).

util.description: Generic utility helpers (parsing, normalization, mapping, small transforms).

model.description: State containers / classes orchestrating data (e.g., K, V, B, H, $, q, J, Z wrappers).

solver.description: (Placeholder) Functions that call backend SBC solve or transform SBC inputs (already modularized elsewhere).

overrides.description: UI override hooks to patch or extend the host application (to be extracted).

progress.description: Progress / status feedback (spinner, progress bar, notifications).

players.description: Player data parsing, mapping, filtering (placeholder until extraction).

rating.description: Rating & chemistry related UI helpers (placeholder; core moved backend).
